product_name: Louis Garneau Evan's Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: The Louis Garneau Evan's Bike Jersey for men keeps you dry and cool, even when the road you choose takes you up big mountains. Mesh panels enhance airflow; full-length zip allows for maximum ventilation; polyester blend fabric is breathable and moisture wicking. 2 back mesh pockets add breathability and 2 angled back pockets are easy to reach. Media port makes room for off-bike tunes. Flatlock seams eliminate irritation and reduce chafing. Silicone gripper at back hem maintains fit. Pockets, back, front and sleeves feature reflective accents for enhaced visibility. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Louis Garneau Evan's Bike Jersey for men has a mini-light tab that allows you to easily attach an illumination device (not included).
short_description: The Louis Garneau Evan's Bike Jersey for men keeps you dry and cool, even when the road you choose takes you up big mountains.
